name: The Last Seal
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D old-school RPG in the vein of Skyfall and Moonfall.

Joan and her best friend are about to complete their training to become Magic Knights. An elite group entrusted with the duty of protecting the country from any possible threat. In a country who was once ravaged by war and disease, the Magic Knights always have their hands full.
When a presumed to be extinct race starts wreaking havoc, Joan and Cadel begin what will be the journey of their lives.

FEATURES


* An extremely vast world with many different cultures and visuals to explore.
* Lush visuals with great environmental design
* A semi open-world experience allowing you to explore the world in any order you choose
* Autosave feature
* Mouse Support
